seems like tata sky is rc6. However,the command length is variable, can be larger than RC6

Tata Sky
For 37Kz,carrier wavelength = 27uS

pigpio readings:
ch+
Kept just one sample. The values vary too widely from 260 to 1325
[2670,880,1335,435,565,770,1020,305,1015,300,475,445,445,451,444,450,1525,286,599,260,585,325,445,450,450,445,565,330,450,445,625,290,430,445,1010,770,630,290,600,295,1325,445,675]


output samples :
Full : after the signal ends,we get all max-durations i.e. 65535. Also the sensor gives inverted output,so S=0 is actually HIGH input to the sensor
Starting..                      S:0,D:2662,S:1,D:656,S:0,D:495,S:1,D:265,S:0,D:528,S:1,D:224,S:0,D:535,S:1,D:663,S:0,D:522,S:1,D:656,S:0,D:948,S:1,D:218,S:0,D:542,S:1,D

Right
Here we see the signal being repeated after 9160 uS. Also the durations seem to vary from 223 to 534. this seems typical of the newer remote
2661,662,521,223,534,223,534,662,514,662,941,223,501,271,521,230,534,223,534,223,507,271,487,271,521,223,534,223,501,271,521,230,534,223,501,271,941,662,907,271,521,662,901,277,521,
9160,
2587,689,487,271,487,271,487,696,481,696,907,271,487,271,487,271,487,271,487,277,487,271,487,271,487,271,487,271,487,271,487,277,487,271,487,271,907,689,907,271,487,696,907,271,487
